statements: UPDATE BlockchainTransactions SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE BlockchainTransactions SET sender_address = '0xABCDEF', recipient_address = '0x123456', amount = 75.25 WHERE transaction_id = '98765432-bcd-ef12-3456-789abcdef000';
UPDATE BlockchainTransactions SET amount = 100.50, timestamp = '2022-01-10 12:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE BlockchainTransactions SET sender_address = 'Alice', recipient_address = 'Bob', amount = 75.25 WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = '8216f274-afc9-48af-b5d4-732280e6c51c';
UPDATE sharding_nodes SET is_active = true, shard_id = 3 WHERE node_id = 'fd049a95-2c9d-42a5-8385-cb7f0f2c0b39';
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET receiver_address = 'xyz123' WHERE sender_address = 'abc123';
UPDATE sharding_nodes SET is_active = TRUE, shard_id = 5 WHERE node_address = 'node123';
UPDATE sharded_blocks SET block_height = 1000 WHERE block_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 150.25, sender_address = 'sender@example.com' WHERE transaction_id = 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-11g7-h8i9-0987654321ab';
UPDATE sharded_blocks SET block_height = 1000 WHERE block_id = '69194e0a-4a45-4f0d-8581-541a1e87e222';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 50.75, timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = '11fd7ccd-dc30-4eca-ae48-1d0c1ecad1bc';
UPDATE Transactions SET receiver_address='0x654321' WHERE transaction_id='12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
UPDATE Blocks SET timestamp='2023-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE block_id=100;
UPDATE Transactions SET receiver_address = 'new_receiver_address' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Blocks SET nonce = 12345, timestamp = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE block_id = 98765;
UPDATE shard_1 SET transaction_count = 100, timestamp = '2022-01-20 10:30:00' WHERE block_number = 10;
UPDATE shard_3 SET timestamp = '2022-02-15 15:45:00', transaction_count = 50 WHERE block_number = 20;
UPDATE shard_1 SET transaction_count = 1000, timestamp = '2022-09-15 10:00:00' WHERE block_number = 500
UPDATE shard_5 SET transaction_count = 1500, shard_key = 'key123' WHERE block_number = 700
